General.Name: Esr Kendall Square Reit Co Ltd
General.Description: ESR Kendall Square REIT Co., Ltd. operates as a logistics real estate investment trust (REIT) in South Korea. It owns, develops, and operates logistics facilities. The company is also involved in investing and managing investment properties, including real estate acquisition, maintenance, improvement and disposal, development, and trade of real estate lease securities. ESR Kendall Square REIT Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
